title: Cinderhulk (just came back from quitting)
body:
Just decided to try play again in ranked and almost every game there's a tank jungler because of Cinderhulk. They ALWAYS buy cinderhulk > righteous glory.
Is the item that OP that it changed the metagame since i quit? Before I quit it was all about offensive junglers and snowballing early.

replies.body:
Cinderhulk is broken to the point where most junglers are tank junglers.

Lee is falling so flat on his face at this point.

Strong junglers are: Sejuani, Gragas, Amumu, Nunu.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IERPdEI5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-09T07:41:47.737+0000)
>
>  Amumu

I will honour you, Amumu is god

well he is .07% off sejuani's win rate, and not even banned.

The difference is that sejuani actually scales off the health and that's why she is banned.
He used to always be banned. xD

I don't recall Amumu ever being an actual worthy ban, the simple fact is you can counter him if you just don't group up in fights, easier said then done however.

Still massively strong in the tank meta, just not as much as sej.
I understand the ban. only down side is his bad start (Super easy 1v1)

Yeah steal his blue and his fucked.

Amumu is probably the one champ where i force everyone to commit to an invade if his on the enemy team.
unless they got a blitz and xin. you know you fucked up then
Can someone tell me what stats this troublesome item has because I don't know anything except that people hate it.
25% hp bonus and the other i think 300 (?) hp

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IERPdEI5,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-05-10T01:20:34.309+0000)
>
> 25% hp bonus and the other i think 300 (?) hp

So basically every jungler gets a ridiculous amount of health very early on can see why no one likes it.

Yes the item is OP, it will eventually be fixed and i say eventually and not soon because Riot's balancing team is very stupid, i wouldn't be surprised if it took them like five more months to do a simple nerf to an item and i mean an actual nerf not a love tap like that Irelia "nerf".

some Jarvans build Cinderhulk now too.

Cinderhulk is so OP, Top laners have started taking Smite/TP so they can build it. Thats how dumb it is.
Even non tanks will get cinderhulk just bcz its op
